description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Juventus vs Genoa in the Serie A
title: Juventus vs Genoa: Serie A stats & head-to-head
title_page: Juventus vs Genoa: Serie A stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Attempt saved. Timothy Weah (Juventus) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Khéphren Thuram.
Post
Attempt missed. Renato Veiga (Juventus) header from the left side of the six yard box misses to the right. Assisted by Francisco Conceição with a cross following a corner.
Post
Fourth official has announced 3 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt saved. Manuel Locatelli (Juventus) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Dusan Vlahovic.
Post
Attempt missed. Koni De Winter (Genoa) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Ruslan Malinovskyi with a cross following a corner.
Post
Attempt blocked. Lorenzo Venturino (Genoa) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Johan Vásquez.
